t: A song of ascents. Of David.
My*pn heart is not proud, Lord,*s my*ld eyes are not haughty; I*ln do not concern myself with great matters or*ld things too wonderful for me.
But*ln I have calmed and quieted myself, I*ld am like a weaned child with its mother; like*ld a weaned child I am content.
Israel,*pn put your hope in the Lord*s both*ld now and forevermore.
